description: Unique, system-assigned identifier for this contact attribute data row; primary key used for joins and updates.
Identifier of the attribute definition that this value represents (e.g., role, phone, department); likely foreign key to contact-attribute catalog; confirm with SME.
The stored attribute content for the contact; free-form text whose format depends on the attribute type.
Identifier of the contact/person this attribute value pertains to; foreign key to the contact master record.
System timestamp when the record was last updated; used for auditing and change tracking.
Timestamp of last modification as recorded by the client/user context, which may differ from server time; confirm semantics with SME.
User or service account identifier that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was first created by the user/application.
User or service account identifier that last modified the record.
Timestamp when the last modification was saved by the user/application.
